name: gitvillance
description: Puntapié inicial para hacer una aplicación en backend-plus desde cero

scripts.prepare: tsc -p tsconfig-client.json && tsc -p tsconfig-server.json && tsc -p tsconfig-unlogged.json && mixin-patch
scripts.build-ignore-error: (tsc -p tsconfig-client.json || echo "continue w/error") && (tsc -p tsconfig-server.json  || echo "continue w/error") && (tsc -p tsconfig-unlogged.json || echo "continue w/error") && mixin-patch
scripts.build-cli: (tsc -p tsconfig-client.json || echo "continue w/error") && (tsc -p tsconfig-unlogged.json || echo "continue w/error") && mixin-patch
scripts.dumpb: (tsc -p tsconfig-server.json  || echo "continue w/error") && npm run dump
